name: The Greatest Heist
description:
The Greatest Heist

Submission for the Community Game Jam 2019. Theme: The game is a Liar 

A game about robbers, cooperation and lies!

Who is the greatest thief? Who is the greatest liar?

How to play:

Plan your way in, break into the main vault, escape! 

Controls 

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Shift - Sprint

Ctr - Crouch

R - Reload

F - Use / Interact

1 to 9 - Select weapon/item

LMB - Shoot

RMB - Scope
